topics.body:
I'm bored so fuck it. These are member based.

1. Trashboat will post whatever the hell he wants. Don't question him.
2. Don't be offended by Too_Offensive. Clue is in the goddamn username.
3. Beware images posted by Blissy123. Eye bleach should be on stand-by.
4. Never mention Viridi in a postive manner around HighRollerHydra.
5. Number1Pegasus fights for his friends. Don't test him.
6. Don't be surprised by mariomarc's honesty.
7. Listen to SquiggyBomb. He has experience in whatever it is you're talking about.
8. SidewardManatee is the Waifu King. Don't question the Waifu King.
9. If Touhou is mentioned, expect uc9 to be close-by.
10. If Mystery Skulls is mentioned, expect EHAN or Carcass Strife to be close-by.
11. See Rule 1 for instructions around Twisty.
12. Whatevs is prone to accusing heresy. Don't irritate.

^these are shit i know^
